title: Price Reduced 1907 Detroit Tigers Real Photo Postcard w/Ty Cobb - SGC 10 $900.
author: OriolesHOF

posts.post_title: Price Reduced 1907 Detroit Tigers Real Photo Postcard w/Ty Cobb - SGC 10 $900.
posts.post_content:
1907 Detroit Tigers Real Photo Postcard with Ty Cobb SGC 10 Poor.  Postally used and exhibits peripheral creasing.

In the most recent Love Of The Game Auction, an SGC 10 sold for $1476. w/buyers premium. 

Payment via PayPal Friends/Family/Gift.  

$900. Delivered USPS w/insurance and tracking.

PM if interested.
